name: Primeape
flavorText:
Always furious
and tenacious to
boot. It will not abandon chasing
its quarry until
it is caught.

previous.name: Mankey
previous.flavorText:
Extremely quick to
anger. It could
be docile one moment then
thrashing away
the next instant.

next.name: Growlithe
next.flavorText:
Very protective
of its territory.
It will bark and bite to repel
intruders from
its space.

pokemon.name: Mankey

anger. It could
be docile one moment then
thrashing away
the next instant.

pokemon.name: Annihilape
pokemon.flavorText: When its anger rose beyond a critical point, this Pokémon gained power that is unfettered by the limits of its physical body.
